layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x142
  LayoutBlockFlow {html} at (0,0) size 800x142
    LayoutBlockFlow {body} at (8,16) size 784x118
      LayoutBlockFlow {p} at (0,0) size 784x20
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 335x19
          text run at (0,0) width 335: "In this test, the THEAD text should be center aligned"
      LayoutTable {table} at (0,36) size 179x82 [border: (1px outset #808080)]
        LayoutTableSection {thead} at (1,1) size 177x28
          LayoutTableRow {tr} at (0,2) size 177x24

              LayoutText {#text} at (58,2) size 57x19
                text run at (58,2) width 57: "THEAD"
